original_text:
Action Bank Plus
Il design semplice e di classe e il gameplay semplice si uniscono nella slot Action Bank Plus, un 6 reel, 4.096 modi per vincere il gioco da Barcrest e Red 7. L’azione di gioco di base è piuttosto elementare, ma innescare la caratteristica round per giri gratis con doppi simboli sulla bobina 1 e wilds sulle bobine 2, 3, 4 e 5. La posta in gioco in questo gioco ad alta varianza varia da 0,10€ a 200€ per giro.
Una grafica poco elaborata
I simboli colorati sui rulli della slot machine Action Bank Plus si stagliano su uno sfondo grigio. Un telaio a effetto metallo circonda il gioco principale, ma nel complesso si tratta di un design insolitamente semplice.
Giocate alla slot Action Bank Plus e vedrete che lo stile semplice si estende ai simboli. I simboli principali sono croci bianche su uno sfondo rosso brillante, il 7 rosso contro il blu e il BAR nero su bianco.
La maggior parte delle slot riescono a confezionare i loro rulli con dieci o più simboli, ma come mostrerà la nostra recensione di Action Bank Plus, ne servono solo tre per ottenere un sacco di combinazioni vincenti.
Solo tre simboli che riempiono le 24 posizioni delle bobine porterebbero a più vittorie in ogni giro. Anche se sarebbe bello, nel mondo reale questo non accadrà. Troverete molti posti occupati da audaci simboli ‘O’ bianchi su sfondi neri. Questi sono spazi vuoti, anche se mentre esaminiamo lo slot Action Bank Plus, vi mostreremo come hanno ancora i loro benefici.
Anche se lo slot Action Bank Plus è stato sviluppato dallo studio Red7, è commercializzato come versione Scientific Games. In alcuni paesi, il nome Barcrest è usato nella pubblicità. Tutto dipende dalla complessa struttura proprietaria di Scientific Games e delle sue filiali.
Funzioni e simboli della Slot Machine
Se si atterrano 4 simboli O in tutte e 4 le 4 posizioni sul 6° rullo, si attiva la funzione Vault. Le O si trasformano poi in caveau bancari. Scegliete uno di essi. Ogni caveau contiene 4, 8, 12 o 16 giri liberi. Al totale del Vault viene aggiunto 1 giro libero extra per ogni simbolo O che si trovava sui rulli al momento dell’attivazione del giro. È possibile innescare un altro giro libero facendo atterrare un quartetto di simboli O sul mulinello 6. Si otterrà quindi un’altra scelta di volteggio.
Ci sono un paio di extra in gioco durante i giri liberi che non sono disponibili nel gioco base. Solo sui rulli 2, 3, 4 e 5 compare un jolly. Questo simbolo jolly sostituisce tutti i simboli standard. Durante i giri liberi, sul rullo 1 appariranno dei simboli doppi speciali. Questi contano come 2 simboli e possono dare una spinta in più alle vostre possibilità di vittoria.
L’azione di gioco base in Action Bank Plus è molto semplice. Il gioco può prendere vita quando si sblocca il caveau e si mettono in gioco i giri liberi con simboli doppi e wilds. Anche in questo caso, non c’è una grande varietà in offerta. Ciò che Action Bank Plus offre è un gameplay volatile.
Se si riesce ad essere fortunati, si può vincere un’enorme puntata di 12.960 x su ogni testacoda.
C’è un po’ di più durante la funzione che nel gioco base, a partire dai doppi simboli che possono apparire sul rullo 1. Questi contano come 2 simboli e possono far partire le vostre combinazioni vincenti al volo. Anche in gioco ci sono simboli jolly. Questi possono apparire ovunque, a parte le bobine 1 e 6, e sostituire i 3 simboli paganti. È possibile riattivare la funzione Vault anche atterrando 4 simboli O sul rullo 6. Si otterrà quindi un altro pick e più giri liberi.
L’azione in Action Bank Plus si svolge su una macchina a 6 rulli, 4 file che si combinano per offrire 4.096 modi per vincere. Sui rulli vedrete un sacco di simboli O. Questi sono vuoti e non offrono alcuna vincita. Possono però essere utili per far scattare il bonus round, di cui altri in breve tempo.
Ci sono infatti solo 3 simboli di pagamento. La X, il Bar e il Lucky Red 7. Atterra 3, 4, 5 o 6 di questi ultimi sui rulli adiacenti e intascerai un premio pari a 0,25, 1, 2,5 o 10 volte la tua puntata totale.
Altre Slot Machine simili
Potrebbe essere un po’ troppo semplice per alcuni, ma se volete una nuova prospettiva su un tema di vecchia scuola, Action Bank Plus offre proprio questo. Se volete slot volatili, proverei Rainbow Riches Megaways di Barcrest, che combina una meccanica ad alta varianza con una classica marca di slot. Se invece vi piacciono le 6 rulli, 4.096 modi per vincere le slot, ti possiamo decisamente suggerire la classica slot Raging Rhino della WMS.

raw_translation.response:
Action Bank Plus
The simple yet classy design and straightforward gameplay come together in Action Bank Plus, a 6-reel, 4,096 ways to win game from Barcrest and Red 7. The basic gameplay is fairly elementary, but triggering the round for free spins with double symbols on reel 1 and wilds on reels 2, 3, 4 and 5. The stake in this high variance game ranges from €0.10 to €200 per spin.
Simplistic Graphics
The colorful symbols on the reels of the Action Bank Plus slot machine stand out against a gray background. A metal frame surrounds the main game, but overall it's an unusually simple design. 
Play the Action Bank Plus slot and you'll see that the styling extends to the symbols. The main symbols are white crosses on a bright red background, the red 7 against blue and the black BAR on white.
Most slots manage to pack their reels with ten or more symbols, but as our review of Action Bank Plus will show, it only takes three to get a lot of winning combinations.
Only three symbols filling the 24 positions on the reels would lead to more wins on every spin. Although it would be nice, in the real world this won't happen. You'll find many positions occupied by bold white 'O' symbols on black backgrounds. These are blank spaces, but as we examine the Action Bank Plus slot, we'll show you how they still have their benefits.
Although the Action Bank Plus slot was developed by the Red7 studio, it is marketed as a Scientific Games version. In some countries, the Barcrest name is used in advertising. It all depends on Scientific Games and its subsidiaries' complex ownership structure.
Slot Machine Functions and Symbols
If you land 4 O symbols in all 4 positions on reel 6, the vault function is activated. The O turns into bank vaults. Choose one of them. Each vault contains 4, 8, 12 or 16 free spins. An extra free spin is added to the Vault total for every O symbol that was on the reels at the time the spin was activated. You can trigger another free spin by landing a quartet of O symbols on reel 6. You will then get another picking session.
There are a couple of extras in the game during free spins that aren't available in the base game. A wild only appears on reels 2, 3, 4, and 5. This wild symbol replaces all standard symbols. During free spins, special double symbols will appear on reel 1. These count as 2 symbols and can give an extra boost to your winning chances.
The basic gameplay in Action Bank Plus is very straightforward. The game can come to life when the vault is unlocked and free spins with double symbols and wilds come into play. Again, there is not a great variety on offer. What Action Bank Plus offers is volatile gameplay.
If you're lucky, you can win a huge payout of 12,960 x on each tailspin.
There's a bit more during the feature than in the base game, starting with the double symbols that can appear on reel 1. These count as 2 symbols and can get your winning combinations started immediately. There are also wild symbols in play. These can appear anywhere but reels 1 and 6, and replace the 3 paying symbols. You can reactivate the Vault function by landing 4 O symbols on reel 6. You will then get another pick and more free spins.
The action in Action Bank Plus takes place on a 6-reel, 4-row machine that combines to offer 4,096 ways to win. On the reels, you'll see a lot of O symbols. These are blank and don't offer any winnings. However, they can be useful for triggering the bonus round, more on that shortly.
There are only 3 paying symbols in fact. The X, the Bar, and the Lucky Red 7. Land 3, 4, 5, or 6 of these on adjacent reels and you'll score a prize equal to 0.25, 1, 2.5, or 10 times your total bet.
Other Similar Slot Machines
It may be a bit too simple for some, but if you want a fresh perspective on an old-school theme, Action Bank Plus offers just that. If you like volatile slots, try Barcrest's Rainbow Riches Megaways, which combines high variance mechanics with a classic slot brand. If you like 6-reel, 4,096 ways to win slots, we can definitely recommend the classic WMS slot Raging Rhino.

faq.answer: When you trigger the vault function, the O symbols turn into bank vaults and you get to choose one that contains 4, 8, 12 or 16 free spins.

faq.question: What are the special symbols that appear during free spins in Action Bank Plus?
faq.answer: During free spins, special double symbols appear on reel 1 and wild symbols appear on reels 2, 3, 4 and 5.

faq.question: What is the maximum payout in Action Bank Plus?
faq.answer: The maximum payout in Action Bank Plus is 12,960 times your total bet.

faq.question: What similar slot machines can be played if I enjoy Action Bank Plus?
faq.answer: Similar slot machines to Action Bank Plus include Rainbow Riches Megaways and Raging Rhino.

Below is a review of the game "Action Bank Plus".

Review: Action Bank Plus
The simple yet classy design and straightforward gameplay come together in Action Bank Plus, a 6-reel, 4,096 ways to win game from Barcrest and Red 7. The basic gameplay is fairly elementary, but triggering the round for free spins with double symbols on reel 1 and wilds on reels 2, 3, 4 and 5. The stake in this high variance game ranges from €0.10 to €200 per spin.
Simplistic Graphics
The colorful symbols on the reels of the Action Bank Plus slot machine stand out against a gray background. A metal frame surrounds the main game, but overall it's an unusually simple design. 
Play the Action Bank Plus slot and you'll see that the styling extends to the symbols. The main symbols are white crosses on a bright red background, the red 7 against blue and the black BAR on white.
Most slots manage to pack their reels with ten or more symbols, but as our review of Action Bank Plus will show, it only takes three to get a lot of winning combinations.
Only three symbols filling the 24 positions on the reels would lead to more wins on every spin. Although it would be nice, in the real world this won't happen. You'll find many positions occupied by bold white 'O' symbols on black backgrounds. These are blank spaces, but as we examine the Action Bank Plus slot, we'll show you how they still have their benefits.
Although the Action Bank Plus slot was developed by the Red7 studio, it is marketed as a Scientific Games version. In some countries, the Barcrest name is used in advertising. It all depends on Scientific Games and its subsidiaries' complex ownership structure.
Slot Machine Functions and Symbols
If you land 4 O symbols in all 4 positions on reel 6, the vault function is activated. The O turns into bank vaults. Choose one of them. Each vault contains 4, 8, 12 or 16 free spins. An extra free spin is added to the Vault total for every O symbol that was on the reels at the time the spin was activated. You can trigger another free spin by landing a quartet of O symbols on reel 6. You will then get another picking session.
There are a couple of extras in the game during free spins that aren't available in the base game. A wild only appears on reels 2, 3, 4, and 5. This wild symbol replaces all standard symbols. During free spins, special double symbols will appear on reel 1. These count as 2 symbols and can give an extra boost to your winning chances.
The basic gameplay in Action Bank Plus is very straightforward. The game can come to life when the vault is unlocked and free spins with double symbols and wilds come into play. Again, there is not a great variety on offer. What Action Bank Plus offers is volatile gameplay.
If you're lucky, you can win a huge payout of 12,960 x on each tailspin.
There's a bit more during the feature than in the base game, starting with the double symbols that can appear on reel 1. These count as 2 symbols and can get your winning combinations started immediately. There are also wild symbols in play. These can appear anywhere but reels 1 and 6, and replace the 3 paying symbols. You can reactivate the Vault function by landing 4 O symbols on reel 6. You will then get another pick and more free spins.
The action in Action Bank Plus takes place on a 6-reel, 4-row machine that combines to offer 4,096 ways to win. On the reels, you'll see a lot of O symbols. These are blank and don't offer any winnings. However, they can be useful for triggering the bonus round, more on that shortly.
There are only 3 paying symbols in fact. The X, the Bar, and the Lucky Red 7. Land 3, 4, 5, or 6 of these on adjacent reels and you'll score a prize equal to 0.25, 1, 2.5, or 10 times your total bet.
Other Similar Slot Machines
It may be a bit too simple for some, but if you want a fresh perspective on an old-school theme, Action Bank Plus offers just that. If you like volatile slots, try Barcrest's Rainbow Riches Megaways, which combines high variance mechanics with a classic slot brand. If you like 6-reel, 4,096 ways to win slots, we can definitely recommend the classic WMS slot Raging Rhino.
